parameters.definition: Number of hours a seasonal snow remover works per shift
Payment for a seasonal snow remover per shift
Number of hours a permanent snow remover works per shift
Payment for a permanent snow remover per shift
Total required labor hours for snow removal

description: A city employs seasonal and permanent snow removers. A seasonal snow remover works \param{HoursSeasonal} hours per shift and gets paid \param{PaySeasonal}. A permanent snow remover works \param{HoursPermanent} hours per shift and gets paid \param{PayPermanent}. Currently the city needs \param{TotalHoursRequired} hours of snow remover labor after a heavy snowfall. If the city has a budget of \param{TotalBudget}, how many of each type of worker should be hired to minimize the total number of snow removers?
